member.name: CRYPT_TIME_STAMP_REQUEST_INFO
member.summary: The CRYPT_TIME_STAMP_REQUEST_INFO structure is used for time stamping. To add an authenticated attribute when signing an executable file to verify the date and time of the signature, a signed time stamp is requested from a time stamp server. The CRYPT_TIME_STAMP_REQUEST_INFO structure is used to get a time stamp. It contains the signature bits of the material being time stamped in the Content field.

member.name: CRYPT_TIME_STAMP_REQUEST_INFO.pszTimeStampAlgorithm
member.summary: The object identifier (OID) that specifies the desired format of the time stamp, usually UTC.

member.name: CRYPT_TIME_STAMP_REQUEST_INFO.pszContentType
member.summary: The OID of the Content Type of the content, usually DATA.

member.name: CRYPT_TIME_STAMP_REQUEST_INFO.Content
member.summary: A CRYPT_OBJID_BLOB structure that contains the encoded signature bits of the material being time stamped.

member.name: CRYPT_TIME_STAMP_REQUEST_INFO.cAttribute
member.summary: The number of elements in the rgAttribute array.

member.name: CRYPT_TIME_STAMP_REQUEST_INFO.rgAttribute
member.summary: Array of pointers to structures, each holding an encoded attribute.
